backend/main.mo: Defines the actor with storage mixin and all core types for sessions, documents, channels, messages, images, and uploads.
feature_evidence.json: Lists feature evidence entries mapping features to related source files, components, test IDs, and confidence levels.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Contains prewritten summaries of various frontend source files for reference or documentation.
frontend/docs/regression-test-plan-playe: Regression test plan detailing steps and expected results for player document file and image upload behavior.
frontend/index.css: Global Tailwind-based styles defining color variables, dark mode overrides, and base UI styling.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point setting theme early from localStorage and loading the React app root.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React application logic handling authentication, profile setup, session restoration, routing, and global providers.
frontend/src/components/app/AppErrorBoun: React error boundary that catches runtime errors and shows a recovery UI with reload and clear-data options.
frontend/src/components/chat/ChannelChat: Chat interface for sending text, roll commands, and images with auto-scroll, replies, and upload progress.
frontend/src/components/chat/ChatMessage: Renders individual chat messages with avatar, replies, long‑press detection, and optional image or roll formatting.
frontend/src/components/docs/DocumentCom: Displays document comments with add and delete actions, including confirmation dialogs and error handling.
frontend/src/components/docs/DocumentCon: Parses and renders document text with embedded file markers, showing inline images or downloadable file attachments.
frontend/src/components/docs/DocumentEdi: Full document editor supporting text editing, file uploads, image insertion, preview mode, and save with revision tracking.
frontend/src/components/docs/ImageUpload: Dialog for selecting, validating, titling, and uploading an image file with size/type checks.
frontend/src/components/docs/PlayerDocum: Full editor for player documents supporting editing, saving, visibility toggling, file uploads, and image insertion.
frontend/src/components/profile/Avatar.t: Displays a user avatar showing an image or fallback initials with size options.
frontend/src/components/profile/ProfileP: Manages viewing, uploading, and removing the user's profile picture with validation and progress tracking.
frontend/src/components/session/ChannelM: Dialogs for creating, renaming, and deleting session channels with validation and async actions.
frontend/src/components/session/Document: Dialogs for creating, renaming, deleting, and locking documents within a session.
frontend/src/components/session/HostSess: Component providing export and import actions for a session, including file parsing, confirmation dialogs, and error handling.
frontend/src/components/session/MembersC: Dialogs for creating, renaming, and deleting members’ channels with form handling and mutation calls.
frontend/src/components/session/PlayerDo: Dialogs and menus for creating, renaming, deleting, and toggling visibility of player-owned documents.
Dialog listing player documents, allowing creation of new ones and selection of existing documents.
frontend/src/components/session/SessionD: Dialog for listing, creating, renaming, selecting, and deleting session-wide documents with error handling.
frontend/src/components/session/SessionS: Sidebar component managing channels, member channels, collapse state, and creation dialogs with UI controls.
frontend/src/components/settings/PreLobb: Settings view for theme, background, nickname, template import/export, and resetting preferences before entering a lobby.
frontend/src/components/settings/UiScale: Popover control allowing users to adjust UI scale via slider or presets and update preferences.
frontend/src/config/polling.ts: Defines polling intervals for messages, lists, sessions, and document content.
React context for loading, updating, persisting, and resetting user preferences including theme and UI scale.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Hook creating and managing a backend actor tied to identity, with query invalidation on change.
frontend/src/hooks/useDocumentComments.t: Hooks for fetching, adding, deleting, and updating document comments with automatic query invalidation.
frontend/src/hooks/useDocumentFiles.ts: Hooks for listing, fetching, and uploading document file references with validation and cache refresh.
frontend/src/hooks/useDocumentImages.ts: Hooks to list images and add images to documents or player documents, triggering related query updates.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides React context and hooks for managing Internet Identity auth, creating AuthClient instances, and exposing login state and actions.
frontend/src/hooks/usePlayerDocuments.ts: React Query hooks for listing, retrieving, creating, editing, renaming, deleting, and updating visibility of player documents via the actor API.
frontend/src/hooks/usePolling.ts: Simple polling hook that repeatedly invokes a callback at a given interval when enabled.
frontend/src/hooks/usePreferences.ts: Re-exports usePreferences from the PreferencesContext for compatibility.
frontend/src/hooks/useSessionData.ts: Aggregates session-related queries for sessions, channels, member channels, and messages, plus mutations for managing member channels.
frontend/src/hooks/useSessionDocuments.t: React Query hooks for CRUD operations on session-level documents through the actor API.
frontend/src/hooks/useUserDisplayName.ts: Fetches a user's display name with fallback to a shortened principal using React Query.
frontend/src/hooks/useUserProfile.ts: Hooks for fetching and mutating user profile data, including profile picture removal and saving caller profile.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind-based global styles defining color variables, dark mode, UI scaling, and chat-specific utilities.
frontend/src/lib/clearLocalAppData.ts: Utility for clearing app-related localStorage keys and sessionStorage.
frontend/src/lib/documentFileMarkers.ts: Utilities for creating, parsing, inserting, and removing file marker tags in document content.
frontend/src/lib/documentImageMarkers.ts: Utilities for handling image marker tags in document content, including creation, parsing, insertion, and removal.
frontend/src/lib/preferencesStorage.ts: Manages user preferences in localStorage with load, save, and reset functions using default values as fallback.
frontend/src/lib/rollCommand.ts: Validates basic dice roll command patterns and returns simple validation results.
frontend/src/lib/sessionExportFile.ts: Creates, downloads, and parses session export files with version checks and data validation.
frontend/src/lib/sessionStorage.ts: Stores and retrieves session context data in localStorage with helpers to clear stored sessions.
Saves, loads, clears, and validates session templates in localStorage.
frontend/src/lib/time.ts: Formats bigint timestamps into human-readable times, showing only time for today or date/time otherwise.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with React Query and Internet Identity provider.
frontend/src/pages/LobbyPage.tsx: Provides UI and logic for hosting or joining sessions, including template application and identity use.
frontend/src/pages/SessionPage.tsx: Manages session interaction views including channels and documents, handling selection and data fetching.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utility functions for reading, storing, and persisting URL parameters with sessionStorage support.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration extending theme colors, animations, and plugins for the project.
project_state.json: Defines the project’s current state, listing implemented UI-scaling features, a pending feature request, and general metadata. Describes settings for UI scale control, persistence, and application across the app.
